Situated on a small acreage, fenced for horses, and backing onto a sloping treed lot, this home provides you with the best of country living while being only minutes from town. The home boasts an amazing large wrap-around deck. The kitchen is just beautiful and opens into a large dining area - fit to host a large family or numerous guests. The sun room located on the front of the home is a peaceful and bright addition to the living area. A bathroom with double vanity and antique claw-foot tub adds elegance and charm to this lovely home. The walk-in closet off the master bedroom is certainly worth seeing!

If privacy is what you are looking for, this may be the perfect home for you! This 3 bedroom home sits on a total of 160 acres of total, peaceful beauty. Plenty of grazing for cattle, sheep or horses, with an amazing view. The home is cozy hosting 2 full bathrooms, laminate and tile flooring (with newer carpet in the master bedroom). Out the backdoor is a large 20x60 shop with concrete flooring, insulated and wired with a wood heater. A small suite is constructed in it as well. Other outbuildings include animal shelters and storage. This property is fenced and cross-fenced, and currently has sheep and horses on it. The only sound you will hear is the sound of birds chirping!
Realtor Remarks: Directions: Follow Moore Drive for 4.3 km, turn right and follow to the end of the road. Total 5.2 km to driveway. The property comes with a grader for road maintenance.

A unique low-density development, each new home is situated adjacent to a generous greenbelt, offering natural privacy as a counterpoint to the numerous amenities and recreational opportunities minutes away from your door. The last of its kind in West Vancouver!
